alert.note: Alert for Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 9:45AM CDT until May 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Richland and Wilkin Counties. .Due to recent rainfall from thunderstorms, the Red River of the North at Wahpeton is beginning to see a response. Anticipating a jump up to Minor stage late tonight, peaking within Minor flood stage on Thursday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Wahpeton. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.6 feet, Otter Tail River water starts to flow into the Breckenridge Diversion. Water on Main Street (Breckenridge). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 11.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
